general_filters.title: Filters (step 3/4)
general_filters.description:
Add a new filter by specifying `Entity ID`, one or more filter attributes and press `Submit`. Remove existing filters by unticking them in `Filters`.

Leave `Entity ID` empty and press `Submit` to make no further changes.

events.title: Subscribed events (step 4/4)
events.description:
Add a new subscribed event by entering its name in `Add new event` and press `Submit`. Remove existing events by unticking them in `Events`.

Leave `Add new event` and press `Submit` to make no further changes.
